title: Great Winged Creature (Grande Ailée)
credit_line: Purchase: gift of the Women's Committee
provenance_text:
Alicia Penalba [1913-1982], Montrouge, France, until January 1965 [1]; purchased from the artist by Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, May 1965 [2].

Notes:
[1]. The sculpture was no. 5 in "The 1964 Pittsburgh International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at the Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1964 - January 1965. The Argentinian artist lived in France by this time.
[2]. The sculpture was acquired by Carnegie Institute from the 1964 International as a gift of the museum's Women's Committee. Payment to the artist (through Carnegie Institute's representative in France) was sent on January 5, 1965. The sculpture was accessioned later, on May 11, 1965.

creator.birth_place: San Pedro (Santiago del Estero province, Argentina)
creator.death_place: Paris (Ville de Paris department, Île-de-France, France)
